title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Skills: Mobile Competency-Centered Language Job Training

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Achieve intermediate-level business English/Korean communication skills required in real-world professional contexts.

Learners will plan, develop, and test one team project over six weeks with at least three team members using mobile-based collaboration tools (Figma, Notion, Slack), submit final deliverables (app prototype or documentation), and achieve over 80% fulfillment (four or more of five peer evaluation rubric items).
Achieve an 80% or higher proficiency rate according to competency-based assessment rubrics.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
